languages.text: "Надеюсь, то, что Домин привечает ксеноса в своей свите — изощренная ловушка для нее".
"I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, то, что Домин привечает ксеноса в своей свите — изощренная ловушка для нее".

traits.locale_text: "I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."
"I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."
"I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."
"I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."
"I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, dass {mf|der|die} Domin einen Xenos in {mf|sein|ihr} Gefolge aufnimmt, ist keine ausgeklügelte Falle."
languages.original_text: "I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, dass {mf|der|die} Domin einen Xenos in {mf|sein|ihr} Gefolge aufnimmt, ist keine ausgeklügelte Falle."

languages.text: « J'espère que l'intégration d'un xénos dans l'entourage {mf|du|de la} Domin n'est qu'un piège destiné à tromper son monde. »
languages.original_text: "I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que l'intégration d'un xénos dans l'entourage {mf|du|de la} Domin n'est qu'un piège destiné à tromper son monde. »

languages.text: «Espero que {mf|el|la} Domin solo haya aceptado una xenos en su séquito como parte de una trampa compleja».
languages.original_text: "I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que {mf|el|la} Domin solo haya aceptado una xenos en su séquito como parte de una trampa compleja».

languages.text: 「ドミンが異種族を{mf|彼|彼女}の従者に引き入れたのは、手の込んだ罠であってほしいわね」
languages.original_text: "I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミンが異種族を{mf|彼|彼女}の従者に引き入れたのは、手の込んだ罠であってほしいわね」

languages.text: “秘者居然会允许异形当{mf|他|她}的随行人员，我希望这是某种精心设计的陷阱。”
languages.original_text: "I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."

traits.locale_text: “秘者居然会允许异形当{mf|他|她}的随行人员，我希望这是某种精心设计的陷阱。”

languages.original_text: "I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."

languages.text: "Domin'in maiyetine bir zeno eklemesi, umarım özenle hazırlanmış bir tür tuzaktır."
languages.original_text: "I hope the Domin bringing a xenos into {mf|his|her} retinue is some kind of elaborate trap."
